Reviews.Title: Pantech Razzle
Reviews.Author: Tori
Reviews.Content: The Pantech razzle was te first phone that I ever had that was only mine. The only reason I no longer have it is that I sadly lost it. This phone has a full QWERTY keyboard that, when flipped also is a speaker. The bottom of the phone is what flips and while on the keyboard side it is slightly angled to text easier. This phone is wonderful and I would recommend it to anyone that wants a great phone without a data plan.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dad of teen girl
Reviews.Content: Great price, the phone works great and is in new condition, and my daughter is happy. battery life is great considering heavy use. Beats signing a new contract.

Reviews.Title: very quick!
Reviews.Author: lorelei
Reviews.Content: quickly received the product and it was as advertised. would definatly order from them again! great timing for my step daughters 13th bday!

Reviews.Title: Great Basic Phone
Reviews.Author: Taylor Carter
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for almost four years now! Works great. I am an 18 year old female who does not have any interest in smartphones.

Reviews.Title: Does a great job!
Reviews.Author: Phyllis H
Reviews.Content: This is a super texting phone that is affordable outside of contract renewal time.  We have a verizon contract that gave us phones that only lasted a few months before issues developed.  This phone is a great replacement for my son who does a lot of texting and it does not require a data plan like a lot of similar phones.

Reviews.Title: Just as expected!
Reviews.Author: tbrooker
Reviews.Content: My son had this phone years ago and broke it. He's missed it ever since. Was glad to find it and give it to him as a surprise!

Reviews.Title: Basic phone
Reviews.Author: Dianne W
Reviews.Content: I needed a basic phone with no data fee.  I liked how this phone has a qwerty board.  Good phone, good reception.

Reviews.Title: Reliable
Reviews.Author: Christine Le Air
Reviews.Content: I had this phone before, but lost it. Nothing else could replace it, it is simple to use and a great deal.

Reviews.Title: great phone - finding a charger sucks
Reviews.Author: Sabrina "I am a slow reader in comparison to ...
Reviews.Content: the charger is an endangered species - if you lose it good luck. you will have to order one and wait till it comes to use your phone. and dont even try the packages with any charger ever in them. they dont fit. i promise. dont waste your money. however the phone itself is incredibly durable. my old one lasted me 4 years and it was run over and dropped in water and fell from bleachers and it was fine. it does not record video so that's a downside. but other than that the keyboard is lovely and i bought a new one because i missed my old one so bad.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: cp
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this phone. Seriously. Super easy to use, good battery life, takes decent pictures, love the swivel qwerty keyboard. Am actually looking to get it again a few years later...I don't have, nor do I want to get a data plan. With little option out there, I'm seriously considering switching to this phone again. Only reason I switched was it was time to upgrade. Love this though!

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Shirley
Reviews.Content: It appears that I got a defective phone.  I cannot hear callers or the caller cannot hear me.  I already own the very same phone that has lasted me 3 yrs, very durable, long battery life. I wanted a back phone in case my phone broke. It is so difficult to find a basic phone these days with a very accessible keyboard.  I use my pantech as a primary phone for calls and used my htc  rebound smartphone for data services ,since the battery life on smartphone are not as good a basic phone.  So needless to say I was very disappointed with the 1st use of my new razzle.
